title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6027.2 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6027.2 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth minimum
standards for the security guard training courses with regard to subject matter
and time requirements, which have been recommended by the council, to set forth
requirements for administration of such security guard training courses to be
followed by certified security guard instructors and to promulgate rules
governing attendance and completion of such courses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6027.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
